input: 슈퍼히어로가 하늘을 날자 사람들의 시선이 집중되는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': "A superhero with a strong physique, wearing a vibrant suit, distinctive mask, and equipped with flight machinery, soars gracefully through the evening sunset sky. Below, a cheering crowd with astonished expressions gazes upwards, their faces lit by the warm glow of the sunset. The camera performs a 360-degree rotating drone shot, circling around the superhero in midair, capturing dramatic contrasts between the hero and the golden sky while panning over the enthralled spectators. The superhero maintains confident posture, looking ahead, while the crowd's expressions shift between awe and excitement as the camera angle changes. No blur, distortion, or unwanted objects present. Cinematic, high-contrast style throughout.", 'koreanSummary': '강인한 체격의 슈퍼히어로가 저녁 노을 하늘을 화려한 슈트, 독특한 마스크, 비행 기계 장비를 착용하고 비행하며, 아래에는 소리치는 군중과 경탄하는 표정의 사람들이 집중된 시선으로 올려다보는 장면. 드론과 360도 회전 샷으로 극적인 대비와 인물, 군중의 감정을 극적으로 묘사함.'}]

input: 갑자기 비가 쏟아져 모두가 뛰어가는 도심의 모습을 영상으로 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'A group of people, including children, teenagers, middle-aged, and elderly individuals, suddenly start running quickly through a city street under heavy rain. The wet street reflects bright primary colors, and the air feels moist. The environment is filled with raindrops streaming down windows and shiny, soaked sidewalks. The scene captures adults, teens, and kids of various hair styles, dressed in seasonally appropriate urban clothing, sprinting towards shelter. Some glance over their shoulders or look up at the rain as they run, their hair and clothes getting drenched. Camera tracking shot follows the crowd swiftly, panning between running figures. Wide shot at first, then medium as the camera weaves through the group, emphasizing the dynamic and vivid city atmosphere. The lighting is a mix of vibrant, saturated hues against dark, rain-soaked concrete, enhancing the bustling, lively tone of a rainy city. Make sure the image is sharp and clear, with no blurring, distortion, or unwanted objects. Facial expressions range from surprised to exhilarated, matching the urgency and excitement of the scene.', 'koreanSummary': '비가 갑자기 쏟아져 도심의 거리에서 어린이, 청소년, 중년, 노인 모두가 빠르게 뛰어가는 모습을 역동적으로 담은 영상. 물방울 맺힌 창과 흠뻑 젖은 거리, 반사되는 인도 등 질감이 살아있고, 밝은 원색이 더해진 생생한 분위기. 카메라는 와이드 숏과 미디엄 숏을 오가며 인물들의 표정과 움직임을 강조.'}]

input: 우주선이 하늘을 가르며 착륙하자 놀란 군중들이 바라보는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': "A futuristic spaceship descends from the sky, performing a gentle touchdown. The background features a faded sunset, casting long shadows over a diverse crowd. Close-up on the faces in the audience: sharp outlines highlight their astonishment. Children display wide-eyed surprise, elderly spectators gaze with deep awe, and the crowd overall bursts into cheers. The camera slowly pans from the detailed, futuristic ship to the crowd, capturing the vibrant emotional spectrum under the warm, dimming light. Wide shot transitions to medium close-ups on the emotional reactions, accentuating the clarity and expressiveness of their faces. Lighting emphasizes dramatic contrasts between the glowing ship and the dusky sky, with emphasis on strong silhouettes. No unwanted objects or blur; the scene remains crisp and focused throughout, with all eyes fixed on the spaceship's landing.", 'koreanSummary': '미래적 우주선이 퇴색된 석양 아래 부드럽게 착륙하고, 놀람과 경외에 찬 군중들의 윤곽이 강조된 얼굴, 어린이의 놀라운 표정, 노인의 경외감, 환호하는 청중의 모습이 카메라에 담기는 장면입니다.'}]

input: 유명 배우가 거리 한복판에 나타나 팬들이 몰려드는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'A middle-aged man with a famous hairstyle stands in the center of a bustling city street, surrounded by skyscrapers and a clear, sunny sky. He is instantly recognized by passing fans. People gather excitedly, some holding up their phones to take photos, while others reach out for his autograph. Colorful urban signs and numerous passing vehicles set the scene. The video starts with an extended close-up of the man’s distinctive hairstyle and composed expression, then lifts up for a broader city view. A rapid zoom-in captures the swell of the crowd as fan reactions intensify, followed by a dynamic panning shot across the excited faces. The lighting is bright and vibrant, emphasizing sharp contrasts and energetic urban life. The celebrity’s gaze shifts naturally—from directly at the camera during the close-up, to acknowledging the fans during autograph requests, and then back to observing the city skyline. No blur, distortion, or unwanted objects present.', 'koreanSummary': '유명한 헤어스타일을 가진 중년 남성이 도심 거리 한복판에 서 있고, 팬들이 사진을 찍거나 사인을 받으려고 몰려드는 장면. 스카이라인과 표지판, 화창한 날씨, 왕래하는 차량들과 함께 빠른 줌인, 리프트 업, 패닝 샷이 이어지며 밝고 생동감 있는 분위기를 강조함.'}]

input: 오래된 건물이 무너지고 사람들은 멀리서 바라보며 속삭이는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'In the scene, an old building with cracked plaster walls, rusted iron columns, crumbling bricks, and broken roof tiles is collapsing dramatically under the clear sunlight. In the foreground, several people—adults of varying ages and genders, wearing worn-out clothes—stand at a distance along a desolate road. Their hairstyles are simple and unstyled, and their facial expressions depict confusion and a faint, sad smile as they whisper to each other while watching the destruction. The environment features a wide, empty road stretching past the collapsing structure. The camera slowly pans from the ruins to the groups of people, capturing their emotional reactions in medium and close-up shots. The style is cinematic, emphasizing strong contrast between the sunlight and deep shadows cast by debris. All elements strictly correspond to the chosen keywords; no blurring, distortion, or unwanted objects present.', 'koreanSummary': '맑은 햇살 아래 낡은 회벽, 녹슬은 철제 기둥, 무너진 벽돌, 부서진 기와로 이루어진 오래된 건물이 붕괴되는 장면. 멀리 황량한 도로 위에 여러 연령·성별의 사람들이 혼란스럽고 슬픈 미소를 띠며 속삭이며 바라봄. 카메라는 잔해에서 사람들로 천천히 이동, 감정 표현 클로즈업. 강한 명암 대비의 시네마틱 분위기.'}]

input: 도심 한가운데에서 갑자기 불꽃놀이가 터지고 모두가 휴대폰을 꺼내는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'In the heart of a bustling city, a diverse group of young adults and children gather along a lively cafe street. Historic buildings and towering skyscrapers frame the background. Suddenly, artistic-patterned fireworks explode brightly in the sky above. Everyone’s attention is drawn upward; both the youth and children quickly pull out their phones, capturing the stunning spectacle. Vibrant colors from the fireworks illuminate their awestruck faces, reflecting off glass building facades. The camera uses a tracking shot, slowly moving through the crowd from a wide shot to a medium shot, focusing on the excitement and collective wonder. The composition highlights the mix of historic and modern cityscape, with no unwanted blur or distortion. The overall atmosphere is one of joyful surprise and shared amazement.', 'koreanSummary': '도심 카페 거리에서 청년과 어린이들이 모여 있는 가운데, 예술적인 불꽃놀이가 터지자 모두가 휴대폰을 꺼내 촬영하는 장면을 시네마틱하게 묘사.'}]

input: 산속에서 빛나는 정체불명의 물체를 발견한 탐험가들이 서로를 바라보는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'An elderly male explorer stands on a rugged rocky hill covered with snow, facing another elderly male explorer. Between them, a shimmering orb and a glowing crystal hover in mid-air, surrounded by shifting, formless smoke and parts of a massive metallic structure jutting from the ground. The two explorers exchange tense, curious glances in a moment of awe and suspense. The harsh, cold environment is illuminated by the mysterious light from the objects, casting dramatic shadows and high contrast. Cinematic style, medium shot, slow panning camera that encircles the explorers and the enigmatic objects, emphasizing their emotional reactions and the stark, snowy landscape. Exclude any blur or unwanted objects.', 'koreanSummary': '눈 덮인 거친 바위 언덕에서 노익장 남성 탐험가 둘이 서로를 바라보며, 사이에 반짝이는 구체와 빛나는 크리스탈, 형체 없는 연기, 거대한 금속 구조가 있는 긴장과 경외, 호기심이 교차하는 순간을 시네마틱하게 묘사'}]

input: 운동 경기에서 결승골이 들어가자 관중들이 환호하는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': "A female athlete in a team uniform scores the winning goal on the field. The moment the goal is scored, the camera captures the stadium stands packed with excited spectators, their faces beaming with exhilaration, joy, and camaraderie. The female athlete's expression shows surprise and triumph, arms raised while her teammates run toward her in celebration. The crowd erupts in cheers, many fans standing, clapping, and raising their arms in the air. The scene is set during the daytime, with bright, vibrant lighting that emphasizes the energy of the event. Dynamic camera motion with a quick pan from the goal on the field to the stands, followed by a wide angle shot that encompasses both the celebrating athlete and the ecstatic crowd. Strong contrasts and vivid team colors create an atmosphere of unity and excitement. Exclude any blur, distortion, or unwanted objects.", 'koreanSummary': '운동장에서 여성 선수가 팀 유니폼을 입고 결승골을 넣자 관중들이 환희와 일체감으로 환호하는 장면을 역동적인 카메라 연출과 함께 묘사'}]

input: 유리창 너머로 눈이 내리기 시작하자 사람들이 조용히 바라보는 장면을 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': 'On a chilly day, an adult and a child stand together near a large window. Outside, trees sway gently in the wind, their branches moving back and forth. Through the glass, faint snowflakes begin to fall, visible against the grey sky. The scene has a quiet, serene tone; the two figures share a silent moment, engaging in a gentle, hushed conversation, occasionally falling into a contemplative pause as they watch the beginning of the snowfall. The adult has neatly styled dark hair and wears a warm, modest sweater, while the child sports short, tousled hair and a puffy jacket. The interior lighting is soft and natural, creating a high contrast with the cold, blue-tinted light outside. The camera starts with a medium shot from behind the pair, capturing their silhouettes against the snowy scene, then slowly zooms in to frame their contemplative expressions as they gaze outward. The overall mood is peaceful and introspective, with no blur or unwanted objects, emphasizing the intimacy of the shared silence and the gentle movement of the snow and trees.', 'koreanSummary': '기온이 낮은 날, 창가에 선 아이와 어른이 바람에 흔들리는 나무와 창밖에 내리는 첫 눈을 조용히 바라보며 대화와 침묵을 나누는, 잔잔하고 고요한 분위기의 장면.'}]

input: 지하철 안에서 갑자기 꺼진 조명에 사람들이 놀라는 순간을 영상으로 만들어줘

allResults: [{'optimizedPrompt': "Inside a subway car with a dim, shadowy atmosphere, passengers of various ages, ethnicities, and diverse clothing styles sit and stand, displaying anxious gestures. The scene is set while the train is stopped, waiting. Suddenly, the soft ambient lighting flickers and abruptly turns off, plunging the interior into deeper darkness. Strong contrasts and vivid textures highlight tense facial expressions and subtle movements—eyes widening, hands clutching bags, or glancing uncertainly at neighbors. The camera executes a dynamic tracking shot, slowly panning across the compartment to capture each individual's startled reaction, emphasizing dramatic light shifts and creating a cinematic, high-contrast composition. Exclude any blur or visual distortions, focusing on sharp detail and authentic, textured realism.", 'koreanSummary': '지하철 내부에서 조명이 갑자기 꺼져 놀라는 다양한 옷차림의 사람들이 불안한 제스처를 보이며 강렬한 명암과 생생한 질감이 강조된 장면을 묘사함.'}]
